articles.author: Antony Ashkenaz
articles.title: Scientists baffled: Earth's rotation 'wobbles' as it moves further away from Sun - Express
articles.description: A DISCOVERY has found that the Earth has been mysteriously spinning faster, while also moving further away from the Sun.

articles.author: Natalie Neysa Alund, USA TODAY
articles.title: Scientist's photo of 'distant star' was actually a slice of chorizo - USA TODAY
articles.description: Étienne Klein revealed a photo he tweeted was not from the James Webb Space Telescope. Instead, he said, he had posted an image of a slice of chorizo.
articles.content:
A French scientist apologized after tweeting a photo of a slice of chorizo that he claimed was a deep-space image of a "distant star" snapped by the James Webb Space Telescope.

articles.author: Antony Ashkenaz
articles.title: Solar storm warning: Air traffic facing disruption as huge sunspot turns to face Earth - Express
articles.description: SPACE experts have warned that a major, potentially disruptive sunspot is facing the Earth today, which could result in the release of a powerful solar flare.

articles.title: “Time Expansion” – Our Perception of Time Has Slowed - SciTechDaily
